keyMoments.title: Strategic Division to Accomplish Multiple Objectives
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates demonstrate strategic coordination by splitting into teams with specific missions: retrieving shadows from Moria, rescuing Nami from Absalom, and recovering stolen supplies before dawn.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's growth in tactical planning and their ability to trust each other to work independently toward common goals.

keyMoments.title: Equipped with Salt for Zombie Purification
keyMoments.description: Usopp provides each crew member with salt to purify zombies, giving them a tactical advantage against Moria's forces.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's preparation and strategic use of intelligence gathered about their enemies.

keyMoments.title: Overwhelming Assault on Zombie Forces
keyMoments.description: Luffy and Sanji decimate dozens of zombies as they push toward their objectives, demonstrating the crew's combat superiority.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Straw Hats can easily handle most of Moria's zombie army when not countered by special abilities.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it

name.japanese: スリラーバーク海賊団

keyMoments.title: Internal Tension Over Absalom's Wedding
keyMoments.description: Hogback becomes frustrated with Absalom's wedding ceremony and assumes a more active command role as second-in-charge.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals internal friction within the Thriller Bark leadership and command structure.

keyMoments.title: Perona Successfully Neutralizes Straw Hat Assault
keyMoments.description: Perona uses her Negative Hollows to completely stop Luffy and Sanji's devastating assault on the zombie forces.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the Thriller Bark Pirates' strategic defensive capabilities against powerful opponents.

keyMoments.title: Oars Awakens as Ultimate Weapon
keyMoments.description: Special Zombie Oars awakens with Luffy's shadow, representing the culmination of Moria's zombie army project.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Thriller Bark Pirates' trump card in the conflict with the Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: Challenges Controlling Oars
keyMoments.description: The crew discovers that Oars cannot be easily controlled due to Luffy's strong-willed shadow, revealing a flaw in Moria's plan.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that even the Thriller Bark Pirates' ultimate weapon has significant control issues.

ships.description: The largest ship in the world, serving as a mobile island fortress
